description: Developed comprehensive Laravel APIs and PHP Filament dashboards for B2B SaaS solutions.
Built responsive frontends with Vue.js for both web and hybrid mobile applications.
Implemented interactive mapping using Leaflet and integrated third-party APIs for real-time parking access and SAML-based user authentication.
Redeveloped the Flächenheizung system, a Building Information Modeling (BIM) web application, from Ruby to the MERN stack, resulting in significant performance improvements.
Solely responsible for the architecture, development, and testing of the new system, implementing Redis for intensive calculations.
Built a custom React.js application to handle client requests using Jira Service Management APIs, adding advanced filtering, search, and voting features.
Developed REST APIs using LoopBack and built an Ionic-based invoice claim mobile application.
Engineered Angular frontend modules for a custom business process management software (Exultec.net).
Key modules developed include Shift Planning, Capacity Pooling, Billing, and automated Contract Management.
Developed frontend modules using AngularJS for the business process optimization web application, Inqoice.
Conducted unit testing with the Jasmine framework to ensure module functionality and performance.
Contributed to a remittance management system for a CMIS Bank Malaysia agent, which provided seamless processing and administration of online and branch-originated transactions.
Developed and maintained the official web app for the Malaysian Medical Association, serving as the largest representative body of doctors in Malaysia.
Provided technical support for key projects, including theEZ-Scheduler 2.0 andRelACS – Relocation Management System**.
